类的使用
org.springframework.mail.SimpleMailMessage

  • 使用SimpleMailMessage的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.mail
    Spring's generic mail infrastructure.
    org.springframework.mail.javamail
    JavaMail support for Spring's mail infrastructure.

    • org.springframework.mail中SimpleMailMessage的使用

      参数类型为SimpleMailMessage的org.springframework.mail中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void MailSender.send(SimpleMailMessage... simpleMessages)
      Send the given array of simple mail messages in batch.
      void MailSender.send(SimpleMailMessage simpleMessage)
      Send the given simple mail message.
      参数类型为SimpleMailMessage的org.springframework.mail中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      SimpleMailMessage(SimpleMailMessage original)
      Copy constructor for creating a new SimpleMailMessage from the state of an existing SimpleMailMessage instance.
